favourite.article: This hymn must be taken from II Chronicles 15 and Isaiah 55, a worthwhile study for those interest lies in such matters. Every blessing as you do so.
I like humming this and telling people what it is if they ask...

I like this song because...At the end of 1992, I was invited to a college gospel mtg with students from Cal state Fullerton, UCI, and Santa Ana campus. I heard this wonderful hymn for the first time, and I felt to be at the right place, right time in my life. I didn't want the meeting to ever end. The words of this hymn were so compelling when you are looking for answers about your human life. Praise the Lord for such an enjoyable song.
